data.oai_dc:dc: Excel-document containing metadata for the raw data (the output from high-throughput sequencing). Sheet 1 contains information on the samples, linking PCR IDs to molecular identifiers (MIDs), sequencing pool (A/B) and design variables (treatment, landscape etc). Negatives and repetitions are also listed here. Sheet 2 lists the barcodes for MIDs 1-100, and the oligos when combined with fITS7 or ITS4. Sheet 3 lists the barcodes for MIDs 246-345, and the oligos when combined with fITS7 or ITS4.
